about.title: About Me
about.text: Hi! I’m Diego Lázaro, a full stack web developer passionate about building dynamic and efficient applications. I love turning ideas into modern, functional digital experiences that blend clean, scalable code with engaging design. I have experience with technologies such as JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, HTML, and CSS, and hold certifications from Ironhack and Microsoft Azure Fundamentals. I’m driven by continuous learning and enjoy exploring new tools that enhance productivity and innovation. With a background in project and team management within the events industry, I bring an organized, problem-solving, and detail-oriented mindset to every project. If you’re looking for a developer with a global vision and strong commitment, I’d love to collaborate on your next digital project.

exp1.description: Internship as part of the Advanced Vocational Training in Web Application Development. I participated as a developer in a collaborative environment, working on the creation and maintenance of web applications. I used technologies such as PHP, WordPress, HTML, CSS, and SQL, focusing on both functionality and code efficiency. I also managed servers on IONOS, ensuring optimal performance and service availability.

exp2.description: Management of major corporate accounts and sports teams, coordinating events and travel. My responsibilities included logistical planning, invoicing control, payment tracking, and personalized service for key clients.

exp3.description: Development of enterprise software and mobile applications. Implementation of innovative solutions to improve efficiency and productivity in internal processes.

study1.degree: Higher Degree in Web Application Development
study1.description: Specialized training in web application development, with a practical and project-oriented approach. I acquired knowledge in programming languages, databases, web design, and agile methodologies, among others.

study2.description: Intensive full-stack web development training at Ironhack, with a hands-on, project-based approach. I gained skills in technologies such as JavaScript, Node.js, HTML, CSS, React, Express, and MongoDB. I learned to build complete web applications, from front-end to back-end, applying agile methodologies and best programming practices.

study3.description: University education in tourism, with an emphasis on event management, tourism marketing, and destination planning. I completed internships in industry-related companies to apply theoretical knowledge in real-world environments.
